name: Escape the Farm
description:
Take on the role of an intrepid chicken in Escape the Farm, a 3D puzzle platformer that offers an escape room experience with a farmyard flavour.
Plot and execute daring escapes from a variety of farms, taking advantage of full dynamic physics to cook up the best-laid plan for success.

Run, jump and glide through increasingly treacherous farmyards, using what you’ve learned from each new flight to break away from the confines of your oppression.



Whether your style is sneaky or berserk, your plucky hen will find the right tools for the job. You might find yourself using an axe to smash a wooden fence, a lantern to navigate a dangerous forest, or an explosive barrel to blow everything sky high. And remember - the obvious path isn’t always the easiest route to liberty.

Good cluck - you’ll need it!
